title: I-601A | Application for Provisional Unlawful Presence Waiver
description: Certain immigrant visa applicants who are relatives of U.S. citizens or lawful permanent residentsÂ may use this application to request a provisional waiver of the unlawful presence grounds of inadmissibility under Immigration and Nationality Act section 212 (a)(9)(B) before departing the United States to appear at a U.S. Embassy or Consulate for an immigrant visa interview.

filings.category: If you are filing as a person seeking or granted immigrant classification as a Violence Against Women Act (VAWA) self-petitioner (including derivatives).
